text: Akhtaruzzaman (1946 or 1947 â€“ August 23, 2011) was a Bangladeshi movie maker. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Director for directing the movie Poka Makorer Ghor Bosoti (1996). The movie won awards in eight different categories. == References == Category:Movie directors Category:Bangladeshi movie directors
title: Akhtaruzzaman
